attributes.action: STOP THE MARCH OF THE SUPERMARKETS
attributes.additional_details: To make the supermarkets sign contracts with their suppliers. To make the supermarkets give British farmers a " fair price ". To stop the supermarkets from browbeating suppliers into lowering their prices. To make supermarkets accountable for the packing they insist on putting their products in. To make supermarkets recycle the packaging they produce. To make supermarkets give a fair price to dairy farmers in Britain. To start labelling their beef as unwanted milk herd and not beef! To stop the ridiculous grading of fruit that means lots of waste.
